entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse Trump says he is celebrating the construction of 200 miles of border wall. NOPE.

FACT: As of May 22, just 3 miles, out of 194 total, had been erected where NO barrier had existed before; the rest was replacement or reinforcement barrier. 
#TrumpIsUnwell 
https://t.co/Eu1uXNYGDn
